data.name: ElectriX: Electro Mechanic Simulator
data.detailed_description:
ElectriX - demo v. 0.7 - WIP



We work on next version of ElectriX demo v. 0.7 - soon more devices and content.
#screenshotsaturday #electrix #simfabric

Add to Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/652620/ElectriX_Electro_Mechanic_Simulator/


If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/


ElectriX demo v. 0.6 Released!



ElectriX demo v. 0.6 released!

Contains:
- New mobile device Blueberry - mobile skill level 4
- Reading Table ready to buy and unlock
- New Options Menu
- New Parts Shop Fix - sorted by device types
- Hacker Notebook ready for Crypto Activation
- Optimization fixes
Currently:
- 6 different devices to fix
- over 100 parts to buy and fix
- storyline with 4 nodes


Add to Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/652620/ElectriX_Electro_Mechanic_Simulator/


If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/


ElectriX - Cryptomining & Hacking



We're hard working on ElectriX demo v 0.6. And we'd like to confirm that code to the hacker notebook is inside the game - just look for numbers :)

With working hacker notebook player will be able to get hacking missions and tasks, and to get this special services we need Crypto to pay for them.

Add to wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/652620/ElectriX_Electro_Mechanic_Simulator/

https://youtu.be/VgBq4Yj2ObA

If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/


ElectriX demo 0.6 - WIP



We would like to thank players for tests and feedback about ElectriX demo v 0.5 and we currently prepare next version of demo 0.6 with new device and fixes.

ElectriX demo v 0.6 - Work in Progress

If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/


ElectriX demo v. 0.5 available!



ElectriX demo 0.5 released!

Contains:
- Two new devices (Nuke 3310, Hacker Notebook)
- Eric 9960 device - fixes
- New story plot
- Energy influence
- Finances influence
- Payment for damaged parts
- Reload and save fixes
- New and used parts

If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/


ElectriX Demo v 0.5 is coming soon.



Electrix demo v 0.5 soon will be released with a new device to fix. Who knows what is it?

If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/


ELECTRIX DEMO V. 0.4 - TOKYO GAME SHOW AND ACCESS



We've just released a new ElectriX Demo v. 0.4 on Steam.

This demo will be available also on Tokyo Game Show in Japan - 20.09-21.09.2018.

After Tokyo Game Show we plan to release Demo v. 0.5 with a new content, more devices and new story plot.

0.4 v. demo contains:
- Automatic Saves
- New mobile device to fix for Skill Level 2 Mobile Devices
- New parts with device indicators
- Tool shop with new more colorful working mats
- Endless Electro Mechanic carreer
- More balanced courses to get higher skills and get more expensive jobs
- More balanced payments for jobs
- Fixes to previous version

If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/


ELECTRIX DEMO V. 0.31 - PAX WEST AND ACCESS



We've just released a new ElectriX Demo v. 0.31 on Steam.

This demo will be available also on PAX West in Seattle - 31.08-3.09.2018.

After PAX West we plan to release Demo v. 0.4 with saves and a new content.

New 0.31 version contains fixes to Demo v.0.3
- Course fixes
- Saving CB Radio status after cancel job
- Double jobs fixes

0.3 v. demo contains:
- New storyline plot
- New devices
- Tool shop with new working mats
- Endless Electro Mechanic carreer
- Courses to get higher skills and get more expensive jobs
- Inspect damaged parts and cancel jobs to avoid unprofitable orders
- Use damaged parts to get new parts

If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/


ElectriX Demo v. 0.3 - Gamescom and Access



We've just published a new ElectriX Demo v. 0.3.

This demo will be available also on Gamescom in Koln - 21.08-23.08.2018.

New demo contains:
- New storyline plot
- New devices
- Tool shop with new working mats
- Endless Electro Mechanic carreer
- Courses to get higher skills and get more expensive jobs
- Inspect damaged parts and cancel jobs to avoid unprofitable orders
- Use damaged parts to get new parts

If anyone would like to play demo and become a supporter it's still possible on our Kickstarter page via PayPal.

There's still possibility to buy betatester pack and achieve access to demo, betatests and release Steam code - when it'll be available.

Here is a link:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator


ElectriX at Gamescom 2018



We are pleased to announce that on 21-23 August in Köln during Gamescom 2018, we will have the pleasure to present Electrix in the German version.

We invite you to Hall 4.1 - stand D050.

During Gamescom on 21st of August we'll present a new demo 0.3 - available also for all supporters on Steam.


ElectriX at ChinaJoy 2018



We are pleased to announce that on 3-5 August in Shanghai during ChinaJoy 2018, we will have the pleasure to present Electrix in the Chinese version.

We invite you to Hall W3 for booth B812.


ELECTRIX: KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN 146% FUNDED



Thank You for your support!

146% Funded!

Now we prepare a new demo for all backers which also will be presented at ChinaJoy in Shanghai on 03.08.2018.

We'll send information about new demo here and on ElectriX Steam page - just Add ElectriX to your wishlist and be up-to-date.

ElectriX Team

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/posts/2238647


ELECTRIX: 2ND GOAL FUNDED!



Second Goal Funded!

We'll prepare 12 language versions of the ElectriX game.

We will try to prepare also a new demo with 12 language versions for the supporters.

There are still 4 days to go, but we are already very satisfied with the achieved result.

We hope that we will be able to receive at least part of the funds for the third goal, which is 5 new mobile devices to be fixed in game.

We keep our fingers crossed and thank you very much for your great support!

ElectriX team

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator/posts/22315


ELECTRIX: FIRST GOAL ON KICKSTARTER FUNDED IN 5 DAYS!



First goal of Kickstarter Electrix campaign funded in 5 days.

Tomorrow we're going to send codes for playable demo to all backers!

Stay tuned and now we fight for next goals.

Thank you very much for your support!

Kickstarter:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator


ElectriX: Support us on Kickstarter! And Get Exclusive DEMO.



ElectriX: Electro Mechanic Simulator is now on Kickstarter!
Back the project and get an Early Access to EXCLUSIVE DEMO.
Help bring this game to life! Support on KS! ->
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1682878583/electrix-electro-mechanic-simulator


ElectriX - Build your Dream PC



In Electrix game player will be able to buy dream PC, upgrade it and test the performance in the Insane Ultra Settings on real games, all in the new PC Master Race career mode.

https://youtu.be/MLpRwAXLNrY


ElectriX - Craft New Devices with 3D Printer



In ElectriX player wlll be able to craft new devices using 3D Printer and parts bought in electro-shops or auctions.

https://youtu.be/ahwSatxs2D4


Electrix - Hack Systems



In the game we will be able to hack courier and miliatry systems to achieve secret information, devices and also to avoid terrorists activities from side stories.

https://youtu.be/UP71kKxCrKk


ElectriX - CryptoMiner New Feature



CryptoMiner - a new feature in Electrix - Electro Mechanic Simulator from our studio SimFabric.

As a player we'll be able to buy CryptoMiner, Upgrade it with new better GPUs and install to dig crypto currency.

Crypto currency will be necessary to buy Hacking Services & Devices in the game.

https://youtu.be/VOuy2y_u6hI


ElectriX - Fix & Play Retro Electronic Games

In ElectriX you can hack fixed mobiles and watch secrets movies with clues to side-stories.



https://youtu.be/mChv8NxcO9M


ElectriX - Fix & Fly Test Drones

In ElectriX you can hack fixed mobiles and watch secrets movies with clues to side-stories.



https://youtu.be/U-Gp0kL1TV0


ElectriX - Test & Play Games

In ElectriX you can test fixed consoles and play games on them.



https://youtu.be/ifryQ7LbS_I


ElectriX - Fix Mobiles

Sometimes fixing mobile doesn't end well.



https://youtu.be/0sIxnTkxTx0


ElectriX - Hack and Watch Secrets

In ElectriX you can hack fixed mobiles and watch secrets movies with clues to side-stories.



https://youtu.be/3SXb4Po7e2U


ElectriX - Fix, Test & Play retro computers

In ElectriX you can test fixed retro computers and play games on them.



https://youtu.be/rO6WDgS0wLk


New ElectriX trailer

New ElectriX trailer - with a list of features.


https://youtu.be/kSHDnQH5uHo


About the Game






















- Over 40 unique devices with skin permutations which give player over 100 different devices to fix
- Zoom in and admire every part from up close
- You can't just simply click your way through the task, you have to be careful not to brake something
- Inspect parts to see their condition - after inspection if costs are bigger than client expects, you can cancel order or ask for bigger budget
- Solder broken parts - project and build your own stuff. It's up to you, if it's gonna work
- Buy old devices and repair them just to sell them for a better price
- Buy broken electronics and scrap them for parts to use it later
- Modern and retro electronic equipment
- Hacking and intelligence special devices
- Special courses to achieve new skills necessary in career advance
- To get energy to work you can make and drink coffee
- You can test and play games on fixed consoles
- You can watch secret movies on fixed mobiles
- You can buy CryptoMiner, upgrade it with better GPUs, install and dig Crypto Currency to use it on Hacking services and devices
- Many different tasks to complete. Some are easy but sometimes there is a client that knows nothing and just tells you that the phone sounds weird
- But the most important avoid troubles...
- And get rewards...
- And always look for clues to solve the mystery...
data.about_the_game:
- Over 40 unique devices with skin permutations which give player over 100 different devices to fix
- Zoom in and admire every part from up close
- You can't just simply click your way through the task, you have to be careful not to brake something
- Inspect parts to see their condition - after inspection if costs are bigger than client expects, you can cancel order or ask for bigger budget
- Solder broken parts - project and build your own stuff. It's up to you, if it's gonna work
- Buy old devices and repair them just to sell them for a better price
- Buy broken electronics and scrap them for parts to use it later
- Modern and retro electronic equipment
- Hacking and intelligence special devices
- Special courses to achieve new skills necessary in career advance
- To get energy to work you can make and drink coffee
- You can test and play games on fixed consoles
- You can watch secret movies on fixed mobiles
- You can buy CryptoMiner, upgrade it with better GPUs, install and dig Crypto Currency to use it on Hacking services and devices
- Many different tasks to complete. Some are easy but sometimes there is a client that knows nothing and just tells you that the phone sounds weird
- But the most important avoid troubles...
- And get rewards...
- And always look for clues to solve the mystery...
data.short_description: ElectriX: Electro Mechanic Simulator - a simulation game of electronic equipment repair with a dark conspiracy twist. In the game we'll be able to fix modern and retro electronic devices like: consoles, computers, mobile phones and other electronic equipment.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Thai, Hungarian, Danish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

ElectriX - Hack mobiles and Watch Secrets
ElectriX - Fix and Fly Test Drones
